summary: June 28 is the 179th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
June 28 is the 179th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar. There are 186 days remaining until the end of the year.
In common years it is always in ISO week 26.
This date is the only date each year where both the month and day are different perfect numbers, June 6 being the only date where the month and day are the same perfect number.
title: June 28
